  • SvcBusSources Swagger API

SvcBusSources Swagger API¶

GET /archivist/v1/svcbussources¶

List all SvcBusSources

List all SvcBusSources, the results will not contain secrets

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – A successful response.

  • 401 Unauthorized – Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

  • 403 Forbidden – Returned when the user is not authorized to list SvcBusSources.

  • default – An unexpected error response.

Response JSON Object

  • sources[].display_name (string) – The displayable name of the subscription. (read only)

  • sources[].identity (string) – Relative resource name for the subscription. e.g. svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 (read only)

  • sources[].queue_name (string) – Service bus queue name (read only)

  • sources[].status (string) – Service bus subscription status (read only)

POST /archivist/v1/svcbussources¶

Create new SvcBusSource

Create a connection to service bus endpoint - archivist will store credentials provided and sync events

Request JSON Object

  • connection_string (string) – Connection String to Service bus endpoint (read only)

  • display_name (string) – The displayable name of the subscription. (read only)

  • queue_name (string) – Service bus queue name (read only)

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – A successful response.

  • 401 Unauthorized – Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

  • 403 Forbidden – Returned when the user is not authorized to create SvcBusSource.

  • 429 Too Many Requests – Returned when the number of concurrent subscriptions exceeds capacity (default=2).

  • default – An unexpected error response.

Response JSON Object

  • display_name (string) – The displayable name of the subscription. (read only)

  • identity (string) – Relative resource name for the subscription. e.g. svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 (read only)

  • queue_name (string) – Service bus queue name (read only)

  • status (string) – Service bus subscription status (read only)

GET /archivist/v1/svcbussources/{uuid}¶

Get SvcBusSource with provided identity

Get SvcBusSource with provided identity, response will not include the secret

Parameters

  • uuid (string) – Specify the Sevice Bus Source UUID where svcbussources/{uuid} is the Sevice Bus Source Identity e.g. 20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 from Identity svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – A successful response.

  • 401 Unauthorized – Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

  • 403 Forbidden – Returned when the user is not authorized to get SvcBusSource.

  • default – An unexpected error response.

Response JSON Object

  • display_name (string) – The displayable name of the subscription. (read only)

  • identity (string) – Relative resource name for the subscription. e.g. svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 (read only)

  • queue_name (string) – Service bus queue name (read only)

  • status (string) – Service bus subscription status (read only)

DELETE /archivist/v1/svcbussources/{uuid}¶

Delete SvcBusSource

Delete SvcBusSource with provided connection_identity

Parameters

  • uuid (string) – Specify the Sevice Bus Source UUID where svcbussources/{uuid} is the Sevice Bus Source Identity e.g. 20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 from Identity svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359

Status Codes

  • 200 OK – A successful response.

  • 401 Unauthorized – Returned when the user is not authenticated to the system.

  • 403 Forbidden – Returned when the user is not authorized to delete SvcBusSources.

  • default – An unexpected error response.

Response JSON Object

  • display_name (string) – The displayable name of the subscription. (read only)

  • identity (string) – Relative resource name for the subscription. e.g. svcbussources/20c97f42-87fc-482c-9d58-4d11abd33359 (read only)

  • queue_name (string) – Service bus queue name (read only)

  • status (string) – Service bus subscription status (read only)
